abstract: Toyota acknowledged that, like its rival automakers in Detroit, it misjudged the drastic swing in the American market away from larger vehicles.
snippet: Toyota acknowledged that, like its rival automakers in Detroit, it misjudged the drastic swing in the American market away from larger vehicles.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — Toyota acknowledged Thursday that, like its rival automakers in Detroit, it misjudged the drastic swing in the American market away from larger vehicles.

headline.main: Toyota Scales Back Production of Big Vehicles
headline.print_headline: Toyota Scales Back Production of Big Vehicles

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Utility Vehicles and Other Light Trucks

byline.original: By Bill Vlasic and Nick Bunkley
